com.compendium.core.datamodel
Interface INodeSummary

All Superinterfaces:
ICoreConstants, IIdObject, IPCObject, java.io.Serializable
All Known Subinterfaces:
IShortCutNodeSummary, IView
All Known Implementing Classes:
NodeSummary, ShortCutNodeSummary, View
public interface INodeSummary
extends IIdObject

The Node object represents a hyperlinkable node that has as its minimum properties a type, label and detailed description.

Method Detail

initialize

void initialize(PCSession session,
                IModel model)
The initialize method is called by the Model before adding the object to the cache. Also, load all the codes associated with this node.

Parameters:
PCSession - session, the session associated with this object.
IMode - model, the model this object belongs to.

getOriginalID

java.lang.String getOriginalID()
Returns the object's original id. When importing maps we need to make sure that objects with the same id end up as the same object.

Returns:
String, the original imported identifier of this object.

setOriginalID

void setOriginalID(java.lang.String sOriginalID,
                   java.lang.String sLastModAuthor)
                   throws java.sql.SQLException,
                          ModelSessionException
Sets the original imported id of this object, both locally and in the DATABASE.

This is the unique identifier for this object as used in the Original Map.

Parameters:
sOriginalID - the original imported id of this object.
sLastModAuthor - the author name of the person who made this modification.
